explanations.neural network: The paper explicitly mentions the use of back propagation neural network (BPNN) methods for building a risk early-warning model.
explanations.backpropagation: The paper discusses back propagation neural network (BPNN), which inherently involves backpropagation as a learning algorithm.
explanations.BP: BP is an abbreviation for back propagation, which is a core component of the BPNN method used in the paper.
explanations.classification: The paper mentions calculating classification accuracy of the RS model, indicating that classification is part of the methodology.
